ISO19115-1 CI_RoleCode Codelist

A taxonomy

Concept Scheme

http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode
Publisher(s)
Geological Survey of Queensland
Creator(s)
International Organization for Standardization
Created
2019-09-18

https://standards.iso.org/iso/19115/resources/Codelists/gml/CI_RoleCode.xml
Ontology RDF
RDF (turtle)

Description

A SKOS version of the ISO 19115-1 CI_RoleCode Codelist. These roles are the roles of parties (Agents) with respect to datasets (Entities). They are taken from the international standard ISO19115-1:2014 Geographic information - Metadata - Part 1: Fundamentals. From ISO19115-1:2014, Table B.16.1 - Responsible party information on page 91 lists properties of the CI_Responsibility class which is 'information about the party and their role'. The 'role' property, indicating a value from the CI_RoleCode codelist - the source of this vocabulary - is described as the 'function performed by the responsible party'.

Authorcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/author
Definition Party who authored the resource

Co-authorcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/coAuthor
Definition Party who jointly authors the resource

Collaboratorcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/collaborator
Definition Party who assists with the generation of the resource other than the principal investigator

Contributorcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/contributor
Definition Party contributing to the resource

Custodiancp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/custodian
Definition Party that accepts accountability and responsibility for the resource and ensures appropriate care and maintenance of the resource

Distributorcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/distributor
Definition Party who distributes the resource

Editorcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/editor
Definition Party who reviewed or modified the resource to improve the content

Fundercp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/funder
Definition Party providing monetary support for the resource

Mediatorcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/mediator
Definition A class of entity that mediates access to the resource and for whom the resource is intended or useful

Originatorcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/originator
Definition Party who created the resource

Ownercp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/owner
Definition Party that owns the resource

Point Of Contactcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/pointOfContact
Definition Party who can be contacted for acquiring knowledge about or acquisition of the resource

Principal Investigatorcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/principalInvestigator
Definition Key party responsible for gathering information and conducting research

Processorcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/processor
Definition Party who has processed the data in a manner such that the resource has been modified

Publishercp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/publisher
Definition Party who published the resource

Resource Providercp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/resourceProvider
Definition Party that supplies the resource

Rights Holdercp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/rightsHolder
Definition Party owning or managing rights over the resource

Sponsorcp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/sponsor
Definition Party who speaks for the resource

Stakeholdercp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/stakeholder
Definition Party who has an interest in the resource or the use of the resource

Usercp

URI http://linked.data.gov.au/def/iso19115-1/RoleCode/user
Definition Party who uses the resource
